00010 void eol_actor_load(
00011     eolActor *act,
00012     char     *filename
00013   )
00014 {
00015   if (!act)return;

00020 void eol_actor_clear(eolActor *act)
00021 {
00022   if (!act)return;
00023   if (act->model != NULL)
00024   {
00025     eol_model_free(&act->model);
00026   }
00027   memset(act,0,sizeof(eolActor));
00028 }

00072 void eol_actor_set_frame_rate(
00073     eolActor *act,
00074     eolFloat rate
00075   )
00076 {
00077   if (!act)return;
00078   if (rate == 0)
00079   {
00080     eol_logger_message(
00081       EOL_LOG_WARN,
00082       "eol_actor:passed a 0 frame rate.\n"
00083     );
00084   }
00085   act->frameRate = rate;
00086 }

00088 eolActor * eol_actor_new()
00089 {
00090   eolActor *actor = NULL;
00091   actor = (eolActor *)malloc(sizeof(eolActor));
00092   if (actor == NULL)
00093   {
00094     eol_logger_message(
00095       EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00096       "eol_actor:unable to allocate actor data!\n");
00097     return NULL;
00098   }
00099   memset(actor,0,sizeof(eolActor));
00100   return actor;
00101 }

00103 void eol_actor_free(eolActor **actor)
00104 {
00105   if ((!actor) || (!*actor))return;
00106   eol_actor_clear(*actor);
00107   free(*actor);
00108   *actor = NULL;
00109 }

00111 void eol_actor_set_action(
00112     eolActor * act,
00113     eolWord    actionName
00114   )
00115 {
00116   eolAction *action;
00117   if (!act)return;
00118   if (!act->model)return;
00119   if (strlen(actionName) <= 0)return;
00120   action = eol_model_get_action(act->model,actionName);
00121   if (action == NULL)
00122   {
00123     eol_logger_message(
00124       EOL_LOG_WARN,
00125       "eol_actor: model %s does not have action %s\n",
00126       act->model->name,actionName);
00127     return;
00128   }
00129   act->action = action;
00130   strncpy(act->actionName,actionName,EOLWORDLEN);
00131   act->frame = action->begin;
00132   act->frameRate = action->frameRate;
00133   act->frameDirection = 1;
00134 }
00135 
00136 eolBool eol_actor_next_frame(eolActor * act)
00137 {
00138   if (!act)return eolFalse;
00139   if (!act->model)return eolFalse;
00140   if (!act->action)return eolFalse;
00141   act->frame = act->frame + (act->frameRate * act->frameDirection);
00142   if (act->frame > act->action->end)
00143   {
00144     switch(act->action->type)
00145     {
00146       case eolActionLoop:
00147         act->frame = act->action->begin;
00148         return eolFalse;
00149       case eolActionPass:
00150         act->frame = act->action->end;
00151         return eolTrue;
00152       case eolActionOsci:
00153         act->frame = act->action->end;
00154         act->frameDirection = -1;
00155         return eolFalse;
00156     }
00157   }
00158   if (act->frame < act->action->begin)
00159   {
00160     switch(act->action->type)
00161     {
00162       case eolActionLoop:
00163         act->frame = act->action->begin;
00164         return eolFalse;
00165       case eolActionPass:
00166         act->frame = act->action->begin;
00167         return eolFalse;
00168       case eolActionOsci:
00169         act->frame = act->action->begin;
00170         act->frameDirection = 1;
00171         return eolTrue;
00172     }
00173   }
00174   return eolFalse;
00175 }
00176 
00177 eolFloat eol_actor_get_frame(eolActor *act)
00178 {
00179   if (!act)return 0;
00180   return act->frame;
00181 }
